content:
I'm happy to share that Topos Insitute is hiring another research software engineer to work on AlgebraicJulia! As the title suggests, this position combines aspects of mathematical research and software engineering. It is a full-time, regular position, in-person in Berkeley, CA. For more info, see the call for applications: https://topos.site/files/Research_Software_Engineer.pdf

Any questions are welcome.
